snippet: Will John McCain's baggage as a Washington insider and someone long distrusted by conservatives be more harmful than helpful to Mitt Romney?
abstract: Will John McCain's baggage as a Washington insider and someone long distrusted by conservatives be more harmful than helpful to Mitt Romney?
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - Back in 2008, during Mitt Romney's first return to the campaign trail as a newly minted endorser of Senator John McCain, he stood side-by-side with his one-time presidential rival and another McCain ally, Gov. Jon M. Huntsman Jr. of Utah.

headline.main: Does McCain's Endorsement Really Help Romney?
